articles.title: First pig kidney in a human: Is this the future of transplants? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Could the successful transplant of a gene-edited pig kidney to a human spell the end of the organ shortage crisis?
articles.content:
The first man to receive a genetically modified kidney transplant from a pig was discharged from hospital on Wednesday last week.
